content: join the verybusymonkey knitters group 1 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/verybusymonkey-knitters/2308795/ formerly ska march mystery sock clue #1 posted 3/1/11 clue #2 posted 3/8/11 clue #3 posted 3/14/11 clue #4 posted 3/21/11 **yarn suggestions ** medium-weight fingering yarn and needles to get you approximate gauge since i was assigned lace as my technique to use the pattern is pretty stretchy if you re worried about the pattern being too small as there is only one size then adjust your yarn weight or needle size to increase gauge a little bit as for color anything between a solid color and more subtle variegation would be good don t be afraid to use variegated yarn but i would advise against variegated yarns where the colors are really really contrasting - the pattern will get lost if it helps my version is knit in malabrigo sock in the primavera colorway on us size 1 5 dpns this yarn is a bit lighter than medium-weight sock yarn and not a super stretchy yarn but it is lovely and shows off the pattern nicely i think if i had any around i would have used a sock yarn with a base like louet gems - i think that would be perfect 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/verybusymonkey-knitters
